body:
Recently, there has been a huge announcement on both servers regarding an official merge, making a single, big, competitive PvP server.

Post on Badlion
Post on Kohi

I'm personally for it, since they are transferring over the knockback and hit detection from kohi for PotPvP since Badlion has acknowledged that their setup for it is atrocious :v Although, they are keeping the rules for badlion, which means no more chill chat anymore from the kohi side ;-;
Also, those banned on badlion and not on kohi will have to show they are an active kohi player to get unbanned when the merge happens, but the other way around is a free get out of jail card.

There's plenty more of information on the posts, just thought I'd spread the word, and want to see what you guys think.
